title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard on a project, a message appears at the top saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. This message appears even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' should not appear when the package name field is empty. If the field is empty, there should be no warning message displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Invoke the New Package Wizard.
